mechanics.condition: Player chooses to use Indomitable AND Indomitable uses available > 0
mechanics.outcome: Player rerolls the saving throw and must use the new roll

mechanics.trigger: Indomitable is used to reroll a saving throw
mechanics.outcome: One use of Indomitable is expended. All expended uses are recovered after a long rest.
Maximum uses of Indomitable increases to 2 per long rest
Maximum uses of Indomitable increases to 3 per long rest

description_text: Beginning at 9th level, you can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest. You can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.
